text: James Richard Bullard (born 23 October 1978) is an English former professional footballer, coach and television personality. He was the co-host of the Saturday morning Sky Sports show Soccer AM. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from London Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Ipswich Town F.C. players Category:Milton Keynes Dons F.C. players Category:Premier League players
title: Jimmy Bullard
